title: Todays Weather Update
description: Check the weather in your city.
sunny_quote: Dhoop me nikala na karo roop ki rani, Gora rang Kala na pad jaye..😉
rainy_quote: Tip Tip barsa pani, pani ne aag lagayi..🌧️
winter_quote: Sardi ka Mausam, mausam me baate teri, Ek chai mithi aur mithi yaadein teri..❄️
windy_quote: Chale jese hawayein sanan sanan, ude jese parinde gagan gagan
thunder_quote: Babuji zara dheere chalo, bijlee khadi yaha bijlee khadi⚡
